actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the reclassification of positions of deputy US marshal, and for other purpose.

summary.text: Provides for the reclassification of positions of deputy United States marshal to that of GS-7, GS-9 and GS-11 (presently GS-6 through GS-9).

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the reclassification of positions of deputy US marshal, and for other purpose.
